```{r setup}
library(rstapDP)
```

## STAP


```{r fit}
fit <- fdp_staplm(BMI ~ sex,
                  stap_term = s_stap("Distance",7),
                  subject_data = FFR_subjects,
                  dt_data = FFR_distances,
                  alpha_a = 1, 
                  alpha_b = 1,
                  tau_df = 2,
                  K = 5,
                  iter_max = 1E4,
                  burn_in = .7E4,
                  id_colname = 'id',
                  thin = 2,
                  seed = 43431)
```


```{r ppcs}
ppc(fit)
```


```{r pairs}
plot_pairs(fit)
```


```{r effects}
plot_cluster_effects(fit)
```
